DOC.brief_summary: This study seeks to determine whether social networking technologies can be used to increase HIV prevention and testing.The HOPE (Harnessing Online Peer Education) model seeks to apply a diffusion of innovations style intervention to social media to increase HIV testing.
DOC.brief_title: HOPE (Harnessing Online Peer Education): Using Online Social Networks for HIV Prevention and Testing
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Has had sex with a man in the past 12 months Lives in Lima or Callao, Peu Has a Facebook account or willing to create one Does not satisfy inclusion criteria
